name: Hanson Brand
description:
For over 20 years, Hanson Design has helped our clients realize their Marketing, Communications and Brand objectives by delivering strategically based creative solutions that increase awareness and drive sales. Our strong Strategic, Creative and Management core competencies, along with our extended resources of creative and research specialists, give us the ability to reach a wide range of targeted touch points.
Our core expertise includes Brand Identity, Packaging, Retail Design, Sales/Marketing Campaigns and Digital Media.
At Hanson Design, our competitive advantage derives from our ability to remain flexible and cost-effective while amplifying exceptional creative brand solutions. The following select group of Fortune 500 companies continue to call upon Hanson Design to help build brand engagement: American Express, Cetra, JPMorganChase, Kraft Foods, Pernod Ricard, Radian, Sodexo and Sterling Capital Management.
